languages.text: "Я просто хочу понять, чем это важно для тебя. Понять тебя саму".

traits.locale_text: "Я просто хочу понимать то, что важно для тебя. И тем самым — понять тебя саму".

languages.text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."
languages.original_text: "Я просто хочу понять, чем это важно для тебя. Понять тебя саму".

traits.locale_text: "I simply wish to know why this is important to you. I am trying to understand you."
"I simply wish to know why this is important to you. I am trying to understand you."
"I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."
"I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."
"I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."
"I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

languages.text: «Solo quiero entender por qué le importa esto. Quiero entenderla».
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

traits.locale_text: «Solo quiero entender por qué le importa esto. Quiero entenderla».

languages.text: 「ただ、これがお前にとってなぜ重要なのかを理解したいんだ…お前を理解するために」
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ、これがお前にとってなぜ重要なのかを理解したいんだ…お前を理解するために」

languages.text: “我只想弄清楚这件事情为什么对你很重要，我想了解你。”
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

traits.locale_text: “我只想弄清楚这件事情为什么对你很重要，我想了解你。”

languages.text: "Ich will nur verstehen, warum Euch daran liegt – um Euch zu verstehen."
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will nur verstehen, warum Euch daran liegt – um Euch zu verstehen."

languages.text: « Je cherche juste à comprendre pourquoi c'est si important pour vous... à vous comprendre, vous. »
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."

traits.locale_text: « Je cherche juste à comprendre pourquoi c'est si important pour vous... à vous comprendre, vous. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca bunun senin için neden önemli olduğunu anlamak, seni anlamak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I only seek to understand why this matters to you — to understand you."
